content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251932,"originalJapaneseLine":"紙には　依頼完了しましたザカリテ　みたいな感じの文面だった","translatedEnglishLine":"The paper had a message like: 'Request completed, Zakalite.'"},{"lineNumber":251933,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnarock Ark"},{"lineNumber":251934,"originalJapaneseLine":"城に戻ったランス、ミラクル、クルックー、フェリスあたりと会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, Miracle, Krukku, and Ferris returned to the castle and talked."},{"lineNumber":251935,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの事を知る（ザカリテの設定参照）","translatedEnglishLine":"They learn about Zakalite (refer to Zakalite's background setting)."},{"lineNumber":251936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス王しか使えないという伝説の宝具、契約の椅子、それに収められているのが悪魔ザカリテ","translatedEnglishLine":"The legendary treasure that only the King of Zeth can use, the Contract Chair, which houses the demon Zakalite."},{"lineNumber":251937,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは責任感の強い子だから使ったのかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic is a very responsible girl, so maybe she used it..."},{"lineNumber":251938,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにマジックが現れる。少し気落ちした感じだが、なんとか笑顔を作ろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Magic appears. She looks a little down, but tries to put on a smile."},{"lineNumber":251939,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かがザカリテにことにふれると、大丈夫よと軽く答える、それより魔物将軍ちゃんと倒せたのね、よかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"When someone mentions Zakalite, she lightly responds, 'I'm fine.' More importantly, you properly defeated the monster general, right? That's great."},{"lineNumber":251940,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、あれはお前がやったのか、よくやったとランスも褒める","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you were the one who did that. Lance praises her, saying 'Well done.'"},{"lineNumber":251941,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、お前の頭の上にある７て数字はなんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, what's the number 7 above your head?"},{"lineNumber":251942,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんでもないわ、気にしないで・・それより","translatedEnglishLine":"It's nothing, don't worry about it... rather,"},{"lineNumber":251943,"originalJapaneseLine":"（　数字は頭の上でなく額に書くかも・・こちらは絵に合わせて下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The number might be written on the forehead instead of above the head... please adjust according to the illustration.)"},{"lineNumber":251944,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがランスを誘う","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic invites Lance."},{"lineNumber":251945,"originalJapaneseLine":"妊娠してからしてなかったので久しぶり、お前から誘うなんて始めてか？","translatedEnglishLine":"We haven’t done it since I got pregnant, so it’s been a while. Is this the first time you've initiated?"},{"lineNumber":251946,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは自分の命が後７日しか無いのを知っているので最後の別れのつもり","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic knows she only has seven days left to live, so this is meant as a final farewell."},{"lineNumber":251947,"originalJapaneseLine":"レールの事にも触れる、誰そいつ？とランスが言うと怒る、あなたの娘です","translatedEnglishLine":"She mentions Rail; when Lance asks 'Who is that?', she gets angry and says, 'She is your daughter.'"},

{"lineNumber":251948,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちゃんと大切に育ててよ、あっ・・娘に手を出したら駄目よ、可愛いからって","translatedEnglishLine":"Please raise her properly and take care of her. Ah... don’t lay a hand on my daughter just because she’s cute."},

{"lineNumber":251949,"originalJapaneseLine":"アホかあたりまえだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you stupid? Of course not."},

{"lineNumber":251950,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは後の事を心配したり不思議な感じ、ランスは気がそれにつかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic worries about the future and seems strange, but Lance doesn't pay attention to it."},

{"lineNumber":251951,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだいったい、今日は変だぞぐらい","translatedEnglishLine":"He just thinks something like, 'What's going on? Today feels strange.'"},

{"lineNumber":251952,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーの敵、魔人メディウサは俺が倒すから安心しろ、明日にも出かけやる","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll defeat Gandhi’s enemy, the demon Medusa, so don’t worry. I’ll leave as early as tomorrow."},

{"lineNumber":251953,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ・・契約の椅子ザカリテにお願いするから私に任せて","translatedEnglishLine":"No... I will ask the Contract Chair Zakalite, so leave it to me."},

{"lineNumber":251954,"originalJapaneseLine":"おお、魔物将軍だけでなく魔人も倒せるのか、それは楽でいいや","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, so you can defeat not just the monster general, but the demon as well. That’s convenient."},

{"lineNumber":251955,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes..."},

{"lineNumber":251956,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、ミステリアとルーシーが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, Mysteria and Lucy appear."},

{"lineNumber":251957,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがザカリテを使っただって、どこだいマジックは、まったくと慌てている","translatedEnglishLine":"They panic, saying 'Magic used Zakalite? Where is Magic? Seriously!'"},

{"lineNumber":251958,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがどこにも居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic is nowhere to be found."},

{"lineNumber":251959,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにをそんなに慌てているんだと聞くと","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked why they are so panicked,"},

{"lineNumber":251960,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの契約の真実を教えてくれる、ゼスの王、それも女性しか使えない","translatedEnglishLine":"They explain the truth of Zakalite’s contract: only female Kings of Zeth can use it."},

{"lineNumber":251961,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーは元より無理だった","translatedEnglishLine":"It was impossible for Gandhi from the start."},

{"lineNumber":251962,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテは契約として相手の魂を受け取る","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite accepts the partner’s soul as part of the contract."},

{"lineNumber":251963,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは普通に生きていたぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic was living normally."},

{"lineNumber":251964,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこかに数字が無かったか、あれが残り寿命日数だ、それが無くなると魂は","translatedEnglishLine":"Wasn’t there a number somewhere? That is the remaining days of life. When it runs out, the soul is..."},

{"lineNumber":251965,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの物になる、永遠に転生する事なくザカリテのおもちゃだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Taken by Zakalite; never reincarnating, becoming Zakalite’s toy forever."},

{"lineNumber":251966,"originalJapaneseLine":"いまだ、ゼス建国の王パセリがそうであるように（パセリはルーシーの友達）","translatedEnglishLine":"Even now, the founder king of Zeth, Parsley, is like that (Parsley is Lucy’s friend)."},{"lineNumber":251967,"originalJapaneseLine":"地上のとあるポイントから、地図で表記、スライム迷宮に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"From a certain point on the surface, marked on the map, they enter the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251968,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム迷宮の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251969,"originalJapaneseLine":"うんちくぽく誰かに、特に害はなく危険はあまりない感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Sounding like trivia to someone, they are mostly harmless and not very dangerous."},

{"lineNumber":251970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},

{"lineNumber":251971,"originalJapaneseLine":"設定","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting."},

{"lineNumber":251972,"originalJapaneseLine":"グリーンスライム、ブルースライム、レッドスライム、などが地面や壁にこびりついています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Green slimes, blue slimes, red slimes, and others are stuck to the ground and walls."},

{"lineNumber":251973,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界のスライムは","translatedEnglishLine":"In this world, slimes are"},

{"lineNumber":251974,"originalJapaneseLine":"苔やカビみたいな存在、淡く光ってはいますが、モンスターではなく無害です","translatedEnglishLine":"like moss or mold, faintly glowing but are not monsters and are harmless."},

{"lineNumber":251975,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム","translatedEnglishLine":"Slimes:"},

{"lineNumber":251976,"originalJapaneseLine":"・自然繁殖する","translatedEnglishLine":"- They reproduce naturally."},

{"lineNumber":251977,"originalJapaneseLine":"・ネバネバして邪魔、たまに固形化する事もある","translatedEnglishLine":"- They are sticky and a nuisance; sometimes they solidify."},

{"lineNumber":251978,"originalJapaneseLine":"・叩く、突くなどの物理攻撃ではダメージを与えにくい、魔法や爆発系が有効","translatedEnglishLine":"- Physical attacks like hitting or stabbing rarely damage them; magic or explosions are effective."},

{"lineNumber":251979,"originalJapaneseLine":"・食用にはならない、緩衝用、クッションの中身、保冷剤、などで一部利用されている","translatedEnglishLine":"- Not edible; partially used as cushioning material, padding fillings, and cold packs."},

{"lineNumber":251980,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム迷宮内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251981,"originalJapaneseLine":"この後、リズナが行方不明になりメディウサ悲惨になります","translatedEnglishLine":"After this, Rizuna goes missing, causing Medusa to be distressed."},

{"lineNumber":251982,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと行動を共にしている時にユーザーに存在を見せておきたいです","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to show the user Rizuna’s presence while she is accompanying Lance."},

{"lineNumber":251983,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か簡単でいいのでリズナぽいイベントを入れて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please add a simple event that feels like Rizuna."},

{"lineNumber":251984,"originalJapaneseLine":"汎用：スライムとの戦闘で倒しきれなかった時","translatedEnglishLine":"Generic: When you fail to completely defeat slimes in battle."},

{"lineNumber":251985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　再生壁で攻撃はしてこないですが、時間切れで倒せない時があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"They don’t attack with regenerating walls, but sometimes you can’t defeat them within the time limit."},

{"lineNumber":251986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　グリーン、ブルー、レッドの３色ありますが、どの場合も共通なので","translatedEnglishLine":"There are three colors: green, blue, and red, but this applies to all cases."},

{"lineNumber":251987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スライムは画面に出さないようにして下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please do not display slimes on the screen."},

{"lineNumber":251988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},

{"lineNumber":251989,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目だ・・こいつら攻撃しても再生しやがる、うっとおしい","translatedEnglishLine":"No good... These guys regenerate even when attacked, it's annoying."},

{"lineNumber":251990,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが言う、こっちにも道がありますよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'There’s a path this way as well.'"},{"lineNumber":251991,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、無理に倒す必要はないかと思いますので、あっちの道をいきませんか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"My lord Lance, I think there’s no need to forcibly defeat them; why don’t we go down that path instead..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紙には　依頼完了しましたザカリテ　みたいな感じの文面だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The paper had a message like: 'Request completed, Zakalite.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarock Ark

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城に戻ったランス、ミラクル、クルックー、フェリスあたりと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, Miracle, Krukku, and Ferris returned to the castle and talked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの事を知る（ザカリテの設定参照）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learn about Zakalite (refer to Zakalite's background setting).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス王しか使えないという伝説の宝具、契約の椅子、それに収められているのが悪魔ザカリテ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The legendary treasure that only the King of Zeth can use, the Contract Chair, which houses the demon Zakalite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは責任感の強い子だから使ったのかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is a very responsible girl, so maybe she used it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにマジックが現れる。少し気落ちした感じだが、なんとか笑顔を作ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Magic appears. She looks a little down, but tries to put on a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがザカリテにことにふれると、大丈夫よと軽く答える、それより魔物将軍ちゃんと倒せたのね、よかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When someone mentions Zakalite, she lightly responds, 'I'm fine.' More importantly, you properly defeated the monster general, right? That's great.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、あれはお前がやったのか、よくやったとランスも褒める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you were the one who did that. Lance praises her, saying 'Well done.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、お前の頭の上にある７て数字はなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, what's the number 7 above your head?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでもないわ、気にしないで・・それより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nothing, don't worry about it... rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　数字は頭の上でなく額に書くかも・・こちらは絵に合わせて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The number might be written on the forehead instead of above the head... please adjust according to the illustration.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがランスを誘う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic invites Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妊娠してからしてなかったので久しぶり、お前から誘うなんて始めてか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We haven’t done it since I got pregnant, so it’s been a while. Is this the first time you've initiated?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは自分の命が後７日しか無いのを知っているので最後の別れのつもり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic knows she only has seven days left to live, so this is meant as a final farewell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レールの事にも触れる、誰そいつ？とランスが言うと怒る、あなたの娘です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She mentions Rail; when Lance asks 'Who is that?', she gets angry and says, 'She is your daughter.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと大切に育ててよ、あっ・・娘に手を出したら駄目よ、可愛いからって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please raise her properly and take care of her. Ah... don’t lay a hand on my daughter just because she’s cute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アホかあたりまえだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? Of course not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは後の事を心配したり不思議な感じ、ランスは気がそれにつかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic worries about the future and seems strange, but Lance doesn't pay attention to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだいったい、今日は変だぞぐらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just thinks something like, 'What's going on? Today feels strange.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの敵、魔人メディウサは俺が倒すから安心しろ、明日にも出かけやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll defeat Gandhi’s enemy, the demon Medusa, so don’t worry. I’ll leave as early as tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ・・契約の椅子ザカリテにお願いするから私に任せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... I will ask the Contract Chair Zakalite, so leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、魔物将軍だけでなく魔人も倒せるのか、それは楽でいいや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, so you can defeat not just the monster general, but the demon as well. That’s convenient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ミステリアとルーシーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Mysteria and Lucy appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがザカリテを使っただって、どこだいマジックは、まったくと慌てている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They panic, saying 'Magic used Zakalite? Where is Magic? Seriously!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがどこにも居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is nowhere to be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをそんなに慌てているんだと聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked why they are so panicked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの契約の真実を教えてくれる、ゼスの王、それも女性しか使えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They explain the truth of Zakalite’s contract: only female Kings of Zeth can use it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは元より無理だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was impossible for Gandhi from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテは契約として相手の魂を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite accepts the partner’s soul as part of the contract.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは普通に生きていたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic was living normally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかに数字が無かったか、あれが残り寿命日数だ、それが無くなると魂は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wasn’t there a number somewhere? That is the remaining days of life. When it runs out, the soul is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの物になる、永遠に転生する事なくザカリテのおもちゃだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taken by Zakalite; never reincarnating, becoming Zakalite’s toy forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いまだ、ゼス建国の王パセリがそうであるように（パセリはルーシーの友達）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, the founder king of Zeth, Parsley, is like that (Parsley is Lucy’s friend).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上のとあるポイントから、地図で表記、スライム迷宮に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a certain point on the surface, marked on the map, they enter the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うんちくぽく誰かに、特に害はなく危険はあまりない感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounding like trivia to someone, they are mostly harmless and not very dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーンスライム、ブルースライム、レッドスライム、などが地面や壁にこびりついています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Green slimes, blue slimes, red slimes, and others are stuck to the ground and walls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界のスライムは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this world, slimes are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苔やカビみたいな存在、淡く光ってはいますが、モンスターではなく無害です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like moss or mold, faintly glowing but are not monsters and are harmless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slimes:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・自然繁殖する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They reproduce naturally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ネバネバして邪魔、たまに固形化する事もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They are sticky and a nuisance; sometimes they solidify.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・叩く、突くなどの物理攻撃ではダメージを与えにくい、魔法や爆発系が有効
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Physical attacks like hitting or stabbing rarely damage them; magic or explosions are effective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・食用にはならない、緩衝用、クッションの中身、保冷剤、などで一部利用されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Not edible; partially used as cushioning material, padding fillings, and cold packs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後、リズナが行方不明になりメディウサ悲惨になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, Rizuna goes missing, causing Medusa to be distressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと行動を共にしている時にユーザーに存在を見せておきたいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to show the user Rizuna’s presence while she is accompanying Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か簡単でいいのでリズナぽいイベントを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please add a simple event that feels like Rizuna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用：スライムとの戦闘で倒しきれなかった時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Generic: When you fail to completely defeat slimes in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再生壁で攻撃はしてこないですが、時間切れで倒せない時があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They don’t attack with regenerating walls, but sometimes you can’t defeat them within the time limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーン、ブルー、レッドの３色ありますが、どの場合も共通なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are three colors: green, blue, and red, but this applies to all cases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライムは画面に出さないようにして下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please do not display slimes on the screen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ・・こいつら攻撃しても再生しやがる、うっとおしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good... These guys regenerate even when attacked, it's annoying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、こっちにも道がありますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'There’s a path this way as well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、無理に倒す必要はないかと思いますので、あっちの道をいきませんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My lord Lance, I think there’s no need to forcibly defeat them; why don’t we go down that path instead...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251932,"originalJapaneseLine":"紙には　依頼完了しましたザカリテ　みたいな感じの文面だった","translatedEnglishLine":"The paper had a message like: 'Request completed, Zakalite.'"},{"lineNumber":251933,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Ragnarock Ark"},{"lineNumber":251934,"originalJapaneseLine":"城に戻ったランス、ミラクル、クルックー、フェリスあたりと会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, Miracle, Krukku, and Ferris returned to the castle and talked."},{"lineNumber":251935,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの事を知る（ザカリテの設定参照）","translatedEnglishLine":"They learn about Zakalite (refer to Zakalite's background setting)."},{"lineNumber":251936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス王しか使えないという伝説の宝具、契約の椅子、それに収められているのが悪魔ザカリテ","translatedEnglishLine":"The legendary treasure that only the King of Zeth can use, the Contract Chair, which houses the demon Zakalite."},{"lineNumber":251937,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは責任感の強い子だから使ったのかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic is a very responsible girl, so maybe she used it..."},{"lineNumber":251938,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにマジックが現れる。少し気落ちした感じだが、なんとか笑顔を作ろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Magic appears. She looks a little down, but tries to put on a smile."},{"lineNumber":251939,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かがザカリテにことにふれると、大丈夫よと軽く答える、それより魔物将軍ちゃんと倒せたのね、よかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"When someone mentions Zakalite, she lightly responds, 'I'm fine.' More importantly, you properly defeated the monster general, right? That's great."},{"lineNumber":251940,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、あれはお前がやったのか、よくやったとランスも褒める","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you were the one who did that. Lance praises her, saying 'Well done.'"},{"lineNumber":251941,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、お前の頭の上にある７て数字はなんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, what's the number 7 above your head?"},{"lineNumber":251942,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんでもないわ、気にしないで・・それより","translatedEnglishLine":"It's nothing, don't worry about it... rather,"},{"lineNumber":251943,"originalJapaneseLine":"（　数字は頭の上でなく額に書くかも・・こちらは絵に合わせて下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The number might be written on the forehead instead of above the head... please adjust according to the illustration.)"},{"lineNumber":251944,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがランスを誘う","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic invites Lance."},{"lineNumber":251945,"originalJapaneseLine":"妊娠してからしてなかったので久しぶり、お前から誘うなんて始めてか？","translatedEnglishLine":"We haven’t done it since I got pregnant, so it’s been a while. Is this the first time you've initiated?"},{"lineNumber":251946,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは自分の命が後７日しか無いのを知っているので最後の別れのつもり","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic knows she only has seven days left to live, so this is meant as a final farewell."},{"lineNumber":251947,"originalJapaneseLine":"レールの事にも触れる、誰そいつ？とランスが言うと怒る、あなたの娘です","translatedEnglishLine":"She mentions Rail; when Lance asks 'Who is that?', she gets angry and says, 'She is your daughter.'"},

{"lineNumber":251948,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちゃんと大切に育ててよ、あっ・・娘に手を出したら駄目よ、可愛いからって","translatedEnglishLine":"Please raise her properly and take care of her. Ah... don’t lay a hand on my daughter just because she’s cute."},

{"lineNumber":251949,"originalJapaneseLine":"アホかあたりまえだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you stupid? Of course not."},

{"lineNumber":251950,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは後の事を心配したり不思議な感じ、ランスは気がそれにつかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic worries about the future and seems strange, but Lance doesn't pay attention to it."},

{"lineNumber":251951,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだいったい、今日は変だぞぐらい","translatedEnglishLine":"He just thinks something like, 'What's going on? Today feels strange.'"},

{"lineNumber":251952,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーの敵、魔人メディウサは俺が倒すから安心しろ、明日にも出かけやる","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll defeat Gandhi’s enemy, the demon Medusa, so don’t worry. I’ll leave as early as tomorrow."},

{"lineNumber":251953,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ・・契約の椅子ザカリテにお願いするから私に任せて","translatedEnglishLine":"No... I will ask the Contract Chair Zakalite, so leave it to me."},

{"lineNumber":251954,"originalJapaneseLine":"おお、魔物将軍だけでなく魔人も倒せるのか、それは楽でいいや","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, so you can defeat not just the monster general, but the demon as well. That’s convenient."},

{"lineNumber":251955,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes..."},

{"lineNumber":251956,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日、ミステリアとルーシーが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day, Mysteria and Lucy appear."},

{"lineNumber":251957,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがザカリテを使っただって、どこだいマジックは、まったくと慌てている","translatedEnglishLine":"They panic, saying 'Magic used Zakalite? Where is Magic? Seriously!'"},

{"lineNumber":251958,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックがどこにも居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic is nowhere to be found."},

{"lineNumber":251959,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにをそんなに慌てているんだと聞くと","translatedEnglishLine":"When asked why they are so panicked,"},

{"lineNumber":251960,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの契約の真実を教えてくれる、ゼスの王、それも女性しか使えない","translatedEnglishLine":"They explain the truth of Zakalite’s contract: only female Kings of Zeth can use it."},

{"lineNumber":251961,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジーは元より無理だった","translatedEnglishLine":"It was impossible for Gandhi from the start."},

{"lineNumber":251962,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテは契約として相手の魂を受け取る","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite accepts the partner’s soul as part of the contract."},

{"lineNumber":251963,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは普通に生きていたぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic was living normally."},

{"lineNumber":251964,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこかに数字が無かったか、あれが残り寿命日数だ、それが無くなると魂は","translatedEnglishLine":"Wasn’t there a number somewhere? That is the remaining days of life. When it runs out, the soul is..."},

{"lineNumber":251965,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテの物になる、永遠に転生する事なくザカリテのおもちゃだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Taken by Zakalite; never reincarnating, becoming Zakalite’s toy forever."},

{"lineNumber":251966,"originalJapaneseLine":"いまだ、ゼス建国の王パセリがそうであるように（パセリはルーシーの友達）","translatedEnglishLine":"Even now, the founder king of Zeth, Parsley, is like that (Parsley is Lucy’s friend)."},{"lineNumber":251967,"originalJapaneseLine":"地上のとあるポイントから、地図で表記、スライム迷宮に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"From a certain point on the surface, marked on the map, they enter the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251968,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム迷宮の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251969,"originalJapaneseLine":"うんちくぽく誰かに、特に害はなく危険はあまりない感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Sounding like trivia to someone, they are mostly harmless and not very dangerous."},

{"lineNumber":251970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},

{"lineNumber":251971,"originalJapaneseLine":"設定","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting."},

{"lineNumber":251972,"originalJapaneseLine":"グリーンスライム、ブルースライム、レッドスライム、などが地面や壁にこびりついています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Green slimes, blue slimes, red slimes, and others are stuck to the ground and walls."},

{"lineNumber":251973,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界のスライムは","translatedEnglishLine":"In this world, slimes are"},

{"lineNumber":251974,"originalJapaneseLine":"苔やカビみたいな存在、淡く光ってはいますが、モンスターではなく無害です","translatedEnglishLine":"like moss or mold, faintly glowing but are not monsters and are harmless."},

{"lineNumber":251975,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム","translatedEnglishLine":"Slimes:"},

{"lineNumber":251976,"originalJapaneseLine":"・自然繁殖する","translatedEnglishLine":"- They reproduce naturally."},

{"lineNumber":251977,"originalJapaneseLine":"・ネバネバして邪魔、たまに固形化する事もある","translatedEnglishLine":"- They are sticky and a nuisance; sometimes they solidify."},

{"lineNumber":251978,"originalJapaneseLine":"・叩く、突くなどの物理攻撃ではダメージを与えにくい、魔法や爆発系が有効","translatedEnglishLine":"- Physical attacks like hitting or stabbing rarely damage them; magic or explosions are effective."},

{"lineNumber":251979,"originalJapaneseLine":"・食用にはならない、緩衝用、クッションの中身、保冷剤、などで一部利用されている","translatedEnglishLine":"- Not edible; partially used as cushioning material, padding fillings, and cold packs."},

{"lineNumber":251980,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム迷宮内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the Slime Labyrinth."},

{"lineNumber":251981,"originalJapaneseLine":"この後、リズナが行方不明になりメディウサ悲惨になります","translatedEnglishLine":"After this, Rizuna goes missing, causing Medusa to be distressed."},

{"lineNumber":251982,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと行動を共にしている時にユーザーに存在を見せておきたいです","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to show the user Rizuna’s presence while she is accompanying Lance."},

{"lineNumber":251983,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か簡単でいいのでリズナぽいイベントを入れて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please add a simple event that feels like Rizuna."},

{"lineNumber":251984,"originalJapaneseLine":"汎用：スライムとの戦闘で倒しきれなかった時","translatedEnglishLine":"Generic: When you fail to completely defeat slimes in battle."},

{"lineNumber":251985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　再生壁で攻撃はしてこないですが、時間切れで倒せない時があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"They don’t attack with regenerating walls, but sometimes you can’t defeat them within the time limit."},

{"lineNumber":251986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　グリーン、ブルー、レッドの３色ありますが、どの場合も共通なので","translatedEnglishLine":"There are three colors: green, blue, and red, but this applies to all cases."},

{"lineNumber":251987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スライムは画面に出さないようにして下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please do not display slimes on the screen."},

{"lineNumber":251988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},

{"lineNumber":251989,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目だ・・こいつら攻撃しても再生しやがる、うっとおしい","translatedEnglishLine":"No good... These guys regenerate even when attacked, it's annoying."},

{"lineNumber":251990,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが言う、こっちにも道がありますよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone says, 'There’s a path this way as well.'"},{"lineNumber":251991,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、無理に倒す必要はないかと思いますので、あっちの道をいきませんか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"My lord Lance, I think there’s no need to forcibly defeat them; why don’t we go down that path instead..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紙には　依頼完了しましたザカリテ　みたいな感じの文面だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The paper had a message like: 'Request completed, Zakalite.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ragnarock Ark

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城に戻ったランス、ミラクル、クルックー、フェリスあたりと会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, Miracle, Krukku, and Ferris returned to the castle and talked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの事を知る（ザカリテの設定参照）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learn about Zakalite (refer to Zakalite's background setting).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス王しか使えないという伝説の宝具、契約の椅子、それに収められているのが悪魔ザカリテ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The legendary treasure that only the King of Zeth can use, the Contract Chair, which houses the demon Zakalite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは責任感の強い子だから使ったのかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is a very responsible girl, so maybe she used it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにマジックが現れる。少し気落ちした感じだが、なんとか笑顔を作ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Magic appears. She looks a little down, but tries to put on a smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがザカリテにことにふれると、大丈夫よと軽く答える、それより魔物将軍ちゃんと倒せたのね、よかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When someone mentions Zakalite, she lightly responds, 'I'm fine.' More importantly, you properly defeated the monster general, right? That's great.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、あれはお前がやったのか、よくやったとランスも褒める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you were the one who did that. Lance praises her, saying 'Well done.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより、お前の頭の上にある７て数字はなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, what's the number 7 above your head?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでもないわ、気にしないで・・それより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nothing, don't worry about it... rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　数字は頭の上でなく額に書くかも・・こちらは絵に合わせて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The number might be written on the forehead instead of above the head... please adjust according to the illustration.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがランスを誘う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic invites Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妊娠してからしてなかったので久しぶり、お前から誘うなんて始めてか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We haven’t done it since I got pregnant, so it’s been a while. Is this the first time you've initiated?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは自分の命が後７日しか無いのを知っているので最後の別れのつもり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic knows she only has seven days left to live, so this is meant as a final farewell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レールの事にも触れる、誰そいつ？とランスが言うと怒る、あなたの娘です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She mentions Rail; when Lance asks 'Who is that?', she gets angry and says, 'She is your daughter.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと大切に育ててよ、あっ・・娘に手を出したら駄目よ、可愛いからって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please raise her properly and take care of her. Ah... don’t lay a hand on my daughter just because she’s cute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アホかあたりまえだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you stupid? Of course not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは後の事を心配したり不思議な感じ、ランスは気がそれにつかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic worries about the future and seems strange, but Lance doesn't pay attention to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだいったい、今日は変だぞぐらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just thinks something like, 'What's going on? Today feels strange.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの敵、魔人メディウサは俺が倒すから安心しろ、明日にも出かけやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll defeat Gandhi’s enemy, the demon Medusa, so don’t worry. I’ll leave as early as tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ・・契約の椅子ザカリテにお願いするから私に任せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... I will ask the Contract Chair Zakalite, so leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、魔物将軍だけでなく魔人も倒せるのか、それは楽でいいや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, so you can defeat not just the monster general, but the demon as well. That’s convenient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日、ミステリアとルーシーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day, Mysteria and Lucy appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがザカリテを使っただって、どこだいマジックは、まったくと慌てている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They panic, saying 'Magic used Zakalite? Where is Magic? Seriously!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックがどこにも居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic is nowhere to be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをそんなに慌てているんだと聞くと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When asked why they are so panicked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの契約の真実を教えてくれる、ゼスの王、それも女性しか使えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They explain the truth of Zakalite’s contract: only female Kings of Zeth can use it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーは元より無理だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was impossible for Gandhi from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテは契約として相手の魂を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite accepts the partner’s soul as part of the contract.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは普通に生きていたぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic was living normally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかに数字が無かったか、あれが残り寿命日数だ、それが無くなると魂は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wasn’t there a number somewhere? That is the remaining days of life. When it runs out, the soul is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの物になる、永遠に転生する事なくザカリテのおもちゃだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taken by Zakalite; never reincarnating, becoming Zakalite’s toy forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いまだ、ゼス建国の王パセリがそうであるように（パセリはルーシーの友達）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, the founder king of Zeth, Parsley, is like that (Parsley is Lucy’s friend).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上のとあるポイントから、地図で表記、スライム迷宮に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a certain point on the surface, marked on the map, they enter the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うんちくぽく誰かに、特に害はなく危険はあまりない感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounding like trivia to someone, they are mostly harmless and not very dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーンスライム、ブルースライム、レッドスライム、などが地面や壁にこびりついています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Green slimes, blue slimes, red slimes, and others are stuck to the ground and walls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界のスライムは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this world, slimes are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苔やカビみたいな存在、淡く光ってはいますが、モンスターではなく無害です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like moss or mold, faintly glowing but are not monsters and are harmless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slimes:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・自然繁殖する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They reproduce naturally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ネバネバして邪魔、たまに固形化する事もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They are sticky and a nuisance; sometimes they solidify.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・叩く、突くなどの物理攻撃ではダメージを与えにくい、魔法や爆発系が有効
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Physical attacks like hitting or stabbing rarely damage them; magic or explosions are effective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・食用にはならない、緩衝用、クッションの中身、保冷剤、などで一部利用されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Not edible; partially used as cushioning material, padding fillings, and cold packs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the Slime Labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後、リズナが行方不明になりメディウサ悲惨になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, Rizuna goes missing, causing Medusa to be distressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと行動を共にしている時にユーザーに存在を見せておきたいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to show the user Rizuna’s presence while she is accompanying Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か簡単でいいのでリズナぽいイベントを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please add a simple event that feels like Rizuna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用：スライムとの戦闘で倒しきれなかった時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Generic: When you fail to completely defeat slimes in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再生壁で攻撃はしてこないですが、時間切れで倒せない時があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They don’t attack with regenerating walls, but sometimes you can’t defeat them within the time limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーン、ブルー、レッドの３色ありますが、どの場合も共通なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are three colors: green, blue, and red, but this applies to all cases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライムは画面に出さないようにして下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please do not display slimes on the screen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ・・こいつら攻撃しても再生しやがる、うっとおしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good... These guys regenerate even when attacked, it's annoying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが言う、こっちにも道がありますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says, 'There’s a path this way as well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、無理に倒す必要はないかと思いますので、あっちの道をいきませんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My lord Lance, I think there’s no need to forcibly defeat them; why don’t we go down that path instead...
